Crafted with fun, bold colors and intricate crochet details, this rattle features a captivating 3D crochet flame that can be moved around the ring, adding an element of playful discovery. 

Made from high-quality FSC-certified mango wood, the smooth ring provides a soothing surface for teething gums, while the soft hand-crochet rocket offers a comforting tactile experience. The rattle's vibrant colors and unique design stimulate visual development, and the gentle rattling sound encourages auditory exploration. 

Safety is our top priority. This rattle has been rigorously CE/UK tested and is safe for babies from birth. It's the perfect gift for newborns, baby showers, or any occasion celebrating a little space explorer. 

Dimensions: Height 15cm. Material: FSC Mango Wood and Crochet.  Bring a smile to your baby's face with the Albetta Crochet Rocket Ring Rattle – a delightful combination of fun, function, and intergalactic charm!

meta_title: Albetta Wild Animals Activity Ring Rattle | Baby Sensory Toy | 12cm Tall
meta_description: Stimulate your baby's senses with the Albetta Wild Animals Activity Ring Rattle.  Hand-crafted with soft, tactile materials, this rattle features a giraffe and elephant and is designed to engage hearing and touch. Made with sustainably sourced FSC mango wood. Safe from birth.
product_description:
The Albetta Wild Animals Activity Ring Rattle is a delightful addition to any baby's toy collection. This charming rattle features two adorable wild animals, Gerald the Giraffe and Estelle the Elephant, designed to captivate your little one's attention and encourage sensory exploration. Gerald is a beautifully hand-crocheted cotton rattle, while Estelle is hand-made from organic cotton toweling. Both characters are incredibly soft and tactile, making them perfect for little hands to grasp and explore.

This activity rattle is not only visually appealing but also designed to stimulate your baby's developing senses. The gentle rattling sound engages their hearing, while the varied textures of the giraffe and elephant promote tactile development. The ring is easy for small hands to hold, encouraging grasping and coordination skills.

Crafted from sustainably sourced FSC mango wood, this rattle is not only a beautiful toy but also an environmentally conscious choice. The wood provides a natural and durable base for the attached animals, ensuring long-lasting play.  This rattle is CE/UK tested and safe from birth, giving you peace of mind while your little one enjoys their new favorite toy.

Enhance your baby's playtime and development with the Albetta Wild Animals Activity Ring Rattle. It's the perfect gift for newborns and infants, offering a combination of engaging play, sensory stimulation, and sustainable design.
